Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Saria's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Barinade#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Red Potion Bottle#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Barinade#.
